items.title: Cardiff say transfer embargo will be 'removed'
items.summary: Cardiff City are under a transfer embargo for "non-submission of annual accounts", but say the situation will be resolved in the coming days.

items.title: Altena koos bewust voor alternatieve route: 'Dan maar even niet het mannetje'
items.summary: Jordi Altena bewandelt een alternatief carri√®repad. De verdediger werd opgeleid bij Vitesse, zette een stap terug naar de amateurs en maakte via RKC Waalwijk een fraaie transfer naar de koploper van Schotland (Heart of Midlothian). Altena herkende het moment dat hij nederig moest zijn.

items.title: Alonso to 'assess the risk' on Mbappe fitness
items.summary: Xabi Alonso said Real Madrid will "assess the risk" of playing Kylian Mbapp√© in Sunday's Supercopa final with Barcelona, with the star forward racing to recover from a knee sprain.

items.title: Parkinson revels as Wrexham pass 'next stage'
items.summary: Phil Parkinson believes knocking Nottingham Forest out of the FA Cup will help Wrexham's push to play Premier League teams on an equal footing.

items.title: Rosenior: Chelsea can equal Man Utd 'class of 92'
items.summary: Liam Rosenior believes Chelsea can emulate Manchester United's fabled 'Class of '92' as they pursue a policy of targeting silverware with young players.

items.title: Arsenal 'chasing' trophies, 'the purpose' - Arteta
items.summary: Mikel Arteta said the "purpose" of Arsenal was to win silverware -- and admitted his season would be judged by how many trophies the north London club could win.

items.title: Flick: Focus is Madrid not Mbappe in Supercopa
items.summary: Barcelona coach Hansi Flick insists his team are focused on Real Madrid, not the potential return of Kylian Mbapp√© in Sunday's Spanish Supercopa final in Saudi Arabia

items.title: Wintertransfers Eredivisie seizoen 2025/26: alle clubs op een rij
items.summary: De transferperiode is weer losgebarsten. In dit overzicht van VI vind je alle afgeronde, door clubs bevestigde, wintertransfers van de achttien Eredivisie-clubs. Clubs in Nederland kunnen tot en met 3 februari spelers aantrekken.

items.title: VI Live: regerend FA Cup-winnaar Palace op achterstand tegen Macclesfield
items.summary: Zaterdag wordt de Eredivisie weer hervat. Er staan vier wedstrijden op het programma. Daarnaast is er volop voetbal in het buitenland. In deze VI Live blijf je op de hoogte van de belangrijkste verrichtingen in binnen- en buitenland.

items.title: 'Barcelona gaat Rashford definitief vastleggen'
items.summary: Barcelona is voornemens om Marcus Rashford te kopen van Manchester United. Dat hebben bronnen bevestigd tegenover onder meer The Athletic en Mundo Deportivo . In het huurcontract van de aanvaller is een koopclausule opgenomen.

According to sources, the north London club are understood to be one of a number of teams interested in acquiring the 27-year-old on a free transfer, but Ren√©e Slegers‚Äô team are leading the running having tracked Stanway‚Äôs progress and are eager to add a world-class midfielder to their squad. items.title: Arsenal interested in Stanway with midfielder to leave Bayern this summer
items.summary: Arsenal are interested in signing Georgia Stanway, with the England international to leave Bayern Munich this summer upon the expiry of her contract.

items.title: Alcaraz beats big rival Sinner in exhibition ahead of Australian Open
items.summary: Carlos Alcaraz won his first clash with Jannik Sinner in 2026 as the top two players in the men's game met in a hardcourt exhibition.

items.title: England's Stanway to leave Bayern in summer
items.summary: England international Georgia Stanway will leave Bayern Munich upon the expiry of her contract at the end of the season.

items.title: Leeds forward McDonnell to move to NRL at end of 2026 season
items.summary: Leeds Rhinos forward James McDonnell will leave the club at the end of the 2026 Super League season and move to the NRL, joining current team-mate Harry Newman in the southern hemisphere.
